description: Not that you find yourself often just driving by Port Bickerton but if you do, there is a wonderful series of trails that start at the lighthouse. there are a few different ones going towards the Barachois cove and then some that go towards the beach and Weeks Pond. The trails are well signed and work is continually updating them.
directions: Reach Port Bickerton on highway 211 in an area east of Sherbrooke. In Port Bickerton, follow signage to the lighthouse.
title: Poct Bickerton Trails
